item.title: Open Source Exposure
item.description: The concept of exposure comes from my practice as a lawyer on insurance matters. My practice in this area consisted predominantly of plaintiff work and as counsel for the Queen of Canada (England) in her role as an insurance payer of last resort in the province of Ontario. In insurance matters the word exposure is a core concept used on a daily basis. I have found that the lingo and concept of exposure is a handy tool in deciding whether and how to include open source software in a project.
